description: Shower drain tile tip…I applied mortar under the drain kit and set it. This provides strength to the area when someone stands on it. I want the drain to be square and slightly recessed below the mosaic tile. I used my toothbrush to clean any thin-set from the grout joints. Our Gold and Platinum members have access to this full tutorial series inside our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com 🔥#tile #bathroomremodel #homerenovation
title: Shower Drain Tile Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
